summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1459, for the improvement of the alley in block 22 of Pontius' Addition to the City of Seattle running between Thomas and Harrison Streets, by establishing the grade thereof, grading and paving the same with asphalt, under Ordinance No. 15710 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
